appDescription.message: It allows you to generate a link to the exact section or paragraph of web page.

browserAction.description: The browser action of the application

cant_find_target_element.description: Message appears when can't find selected element, on creating link

cant_find_selector.message: Oops something has gone wrong, please try again.

cant_copy_to_clipboard.message: Oops something has gone wrong, please try again.
cant_copy_to_clipboard.description: Message appears when can't copy url to clipboard (maybe some exceptions)

create_success.message: Link was copied to the clipboard. Use Ctrl + V to paste it.
create_success.description: Message appears when all alright and link was copied to clipboard

options_saved.description: Message appears when extension options are saved (on options.html page)
